title: LTH Forum Great Neighborhood Restaurants
name: LTH Forum Great Neighborhood Restaurants
description: A listing of restaurants selected for recognition by the members of the LTHForum.com community.  Not of earthshaking performance, but it was something I had in a KML file.

properties.name: "Little" Three Happiness Restaurant
properties.description: Outstanding Chinatown hole-in-the-wall (from which LTHForum takes its name).LTH GNR Thread209 W Cermak RdChicago, IL 60616(312) 842-1964

properties.name: A Tavola
properties.description: Like eating at a friend's, if your friend had a quiet West Town storefront and was a great Italian cook. Don't miss the gnocchi.  LTH GNR Thread 2148 W Chicago AveChicago, IL 60622more info »

properties.name: Al's No 1 Italian Beef
properties.description: Taylor Street stand serving classic Chicago Italian beef and charcoal-grilled sausage.LTH GNR Thread1079 W Taylor StChicago, IL 60607(312) 226-4017

properties.name: Al`s Deli
properties.description: There is beauty to a simple sandwich, made right, as the brothers who run this Evanston institution clearly understand. Try the Brie sandwich and be sure to save room for a cookie.  LTH GNR Thread 914 Noyes StEvanston,illinois, IL 60201more info »

properties.name: Amanacer Tapatio
properties.description: Could the best and most authentic Mexican restaurant in the Chicagoland area be this tiny, very friendly storefront in Joliet?LTH GNR Thread700 Ruby StJoliet, IL 60435Get Directions(815) 727-4001

properties.name: Avec Restaurant
properties.description: Offering small plates and wine at communal tables in the west Loop. It does not hurt to have one of Chicago's best chefs helping out, either. Probably more pan-Mediterranean than Spanish, but just eat, drink, and don't worry.  LTH GNR Thread 615 W Randolph St Chicago, IL 60661more info »

properties.name: Barbara Ann's BBQ
properties.description: South side BBQ joint serving excellent ribs and arguably the city's best hot links.LTH GNR Thread7621 S Cottage Grove AveChicago, IL 60619(773) 723-4780

properties.name: Birreria Reyes de Ocotlan
properties.description: A one dish restaurant, but what a dish-- birria, piquantly roasted goat, served with a simple squeeze of lime or salsa.LTH GNR Thread1322 W 18th StChicago, IL 60608(312) 733-2613

properties.name: Bombon Bakery
properties.description: Chicago's best Mexican bakery (and maybe best bakery period), this highlight of any visit to Pilsen is owned by a couple who trained under Rick Bayless and in Europe.LTH GNR Thread1508 W 18th StChicago, IL 60608(312) 733-7788

properties.name: Brown Sack
properties.description: In the no man's land between Logan Square and Humboldt Park, Brown Sack welcomes you home with fresh food made to order and a warm reception. Soups and sandwiches, some old standards and some more adventurous, take center stage.  LTH GNR Thread 3706 W Armitage AveChicago, IL 60647more info »

properties.name: Burt's Place
properties.description: A pizza master who started several of the area's best-known spots now holds court and serves great deep-dish in this homey little spot hidden on a side street in Morton Grove.LTH GNR Thread8541 N FerrisMorton Grove, IL 60053 847-965-7997

properties.name: Cafeteria Marianao
properties.description: A little slice of Miami in a busy, ramshackle stand offering Cuban sandwiches and coffee.LTH GNR Thread2246 N Milwaukee AveChicago, IL 60647(773) 278-4533

properties.name: Cajun Connection
properties.description: It may be a day trip from Chicago to Utica and nearby Starved Rock State Park, but you can be sure you will not go hungry. Great cajun classics and a chance to admire a master in at the deep fryer. LTH GNR Thread 897 E US Highway 6Utica, IL 61373more info »

properties.name: Calumet Fisheries Inc
properties.description: One of the last shrimp huts of its kind, serving up addictive smoked and fried shrimp and fish in the shadow of the Skyway and the steel mills.LTH GNR Thread3259 E 95th StChicago, IL 60617(773) 933-9855

properties.name: Captain Porky's Inc
properties.description: Another day trip to a state park, Illinois Beach in Zion this time, is best capped with a visit to this little place with the big servings. Great smoked and fried foods. LTH GNR Thread 39210 N Sheridan RdBeach Park, IL 60099more info »

properties.name: Cemitas Puebla
properties.description: (formerly known as Taqueria Puebla) Soccer-themed Humboldt Park stand specializing in freshly-made cemitas-- Mexican sandwiches with a smoky blast of chipotle heat.LTH GNR Thread3619 W North AveChicago, IL 60647(773) 772-8435

properties.name: Chaihanna
properties.description: Is this the only Uzbeki place in Chicago? Bright and friendly restaurant in Buffalo Grove, featuring pickled vegetables and watermelon, grilled meats and more. LTH GNR Thread 19 E Dundee RdBuffalo Grove, IL 60089more info »

properties.name: Chuck's Southern Comfort Cafe
properties.description: South suburban Burbank's best restaurant by a country mile, a Frontera alum dishing up high-class comfort food.LTH GNR Thread5557 W 79th StBurbank, IL 60459(708) 229-8700

properties.name: Coalfire Pizza
properties.description: A genuine coal-fired oven is responsible for the tasty char on Italian and New Haven-style thin crust pizzas at this Grand Avenue newcomer. LTH GNR Thread1321 W Grand AveChicago, IL 60622(312) 226-2625

properties.name: Cunis Candies Inc
properties.description: Far South side ice cream parlor and candy shop serving up housemade delights.LTH GNR Thread1030 E 162nd StSouth Holland, IL 60473(708) 596-2440

properties.name: Depot American Diner
properties.description: American diner classics beautifully made from scratch, no shortcuts, in a revived old diner space on the Chicago-Berwyn border. LTH GNR Thread5840 W Roosevelt RdChicago, IL 60644773-261-8422

properties.name: Deta's Cafe
properties.description: Homey and incredibly welcoming one-woman restaurant dishing up freshly made Montenegrin bureks and soup near the Evanston border. LTH GNR Thread7555 N Ridge BlvdChicago, IL 60645773-973-1505

properties.name: Double Li
properties.description: Basic Chinatown storefront specializes in food that will kick you in the pants, in the best way. Mainly Szechwan, and the best stuff is very complex and very spicy. LTH GNR Thread 228 W Cermak Rd Chicago, IL 60616more info »

properties.name: Ed's Potsticker House
properties.description: Northern and northeastern Chinese restaurant off the beaten path in Bridgeport.LTH GNR Thread3139 S Halsted StChicago, IL 60608(312) 326-6898

properties.name: Fabulous Noodles
properties.description: Chinatown-quality authentic Chinese in a Lisle mini-mall.LTH GNR Thread4663 Old Tavern RdLisle, IL 60532(630) 305-8868

properties.name: Fonda Del Mar
properties.description: Upscale but reasonably priced Logan Square Mexican restaurant stressing high quality seafood dishes.LTH GNR Thread3749 W Fullerton AveChicago, IL 60647(773) 489-3748

properties.name: Freddy's Pizzeria
properties.description: Cicero deli offering housemade Italian-American dinners, sausages, pizzas, gelato and breads.LTH GNR Thread1600 S 61st AveCicero, IL 60804(708) 863-9289

properties.name: Fredhots & Fries Inc
properties.description: The enthusiastic owner of this Glenview hot dog stand goes beyond the usual red hots for everything from reindeer sausages to homemade aiolis to dip your frites in. LTH GNR Thread1707 Chestnut AveGlenview, IL 60025(847) 657-9200

properties.name: Gene & Jude Red Hot Stand
properties.description: Ultra-minimalist hot dog stand in River Grove serving classic Chicago dogs and fresh-cut fries.LTH GNR Thread2720 River RdRiver Grove, IL 60171(708) 452-7634

properties.name: Habana Libre Inc
properties.description: West Town Cuban spot offers great food and drink, day or night. LTH GNR Thread 1440 W Chicago Ave Chicago, IL 60642more info »

properties.name: Haewoondae Restaurant
properties.description: Authentic-feeling, popular Korean BBQ spot where you can sit at a table or on mats to grill your own meat over charcoal.LTH GNR Thread6240 N California AveChicago, IL 60659(773) 764-8018

properties.name: Healthy Food Lithuanian
properties.description: Believed to be the oldest surviving Lithuanian restaurant in the world, a charming slice of old ethnic Chicago serving up beyond-hearty food in Bridgeport. LTH GNR Thread3236 S Halsted StChicago, IL 60608(312) 326-2724

properties.name: Honey One BBQ
properties.description: Terrific, authentically wood-smoked barbecue ribs, rib tips and hot links, transplanted from the west side to Bucktown.LTH GNR Thread2241 N Western AveChicago, IL 60647(773) 227-5130

properties.name: Hopleaf Bar
properties.description: Andersonville fixture packing them in for a Belgian-focused beer list and hearty European bar food like mussels and frites.LTH GNR Thread5148 N Clark StChicago, IL 60640(773) 334-9851

properties.name: Hot Doug's Inc
properties.description: Wildly innovative Roscoe Village .encased meats emporium. serving exotic sausages and duck fat fries.LTH GNR Thread3324 N California AveChicago, IL 60618(773) 279-9550

properties.name: Jimmy's Red Hots
properties.description: For many, the classic Chicago Hot Dog is an object of reverence, even worship. On the far west side, Jimmy's is a temple for those faithful. We never argue about where to find the best Hot Dog, lest blood be spilled, but Jimmy's is a great hot hog and a Chicago classic. LTH GNR Thread 4000 W Grand AveChicago, IL 60651more info »

properties.name: Johnnie's Beef
properties.description: Italian beef and sausage fans line up all day long at this legendary spot for the quintessential Chicago specialty.LTH GNR Thread7500 W North AveElmwood Park, IL 60707(708) 452-6000

properties.name: Katsu Japanese Restaurant
properties.description: On an obscure stretch of Peterson, pristinely fresh and beautifully prepared sushi, sashimi and cooked dishes.LTH GNR Thread2649 W Peterson AveChicago, IL 60659(773) 784-3383

properties.name: Katy's Dumpling House
properties.description: Despite the name, handmade noodles are the real star attraction at this tiny spot in a remarkably diverse ethnic strip mall in Westmont.LTH GNR Thread665 N Cass AveWestmont, IL 60559(630) 323-9393

properties.name: Khan's BBQ Restaurant
properties.description: Devon Avenue Pakistani restaurant offers grilled meats which sizzle with charcoal flavor and pungent eastern spices. LTH GNR Thread2401 W Devon AveChicago, IL 60659(773) 338-2800

properties.name: Klas Restaurant
properties.description: Capone-era Mittel-European fantasy Czech restaurant in Cicero.LTH GNR Thread5734 W Cermak RdCicero, IL 60804(708) 652-0795

properties.name: Kuma's Corner
properties.description: Avondale standout among Chicago's many pub & grub spots, thanks to imaginative burgers, a serious beer list focused on regional brewers, and a surprisingly welcoming tattooed-and-pierced vibe. LTH GNR Thread2900 W Belmont AveChicago, IL 60618(773) 604-8769

properties.name: La Casa De Isaac
properties.description: A splash of Mexican sun and soul on the Highland Park/Highwood restaurant row, though don't go Friday nights-- the restaurant-veteran brothers who own it keep the Jewish sabbath (though not strict kosher). LTH GNR Thread 431 Temple AveHighland Park, IL 60035(847) 433-5550

properties.name: La Casa De Samuel
properties.description: Sitdown Little Village Mexican restaurant (with a mariachi feel) offering fine handmade tortillas and some unusual specialties like venison.LTH GNR Thread2834 W Cermak RdChicago, IL 60623(773) 376-7474

properties.name: La Oaxaquena
properties.description: Pair of fine family Mexican restaurants on north Milwaukee and west Diversey, serving outstanding freshly-made versions of classics like chicken mole.LTH GNR Thread3382 N Milwaukee AveChicago, IL 60641(773) 545-8585

properties.name: La Pasadita (East)
properties.description: Late night revelers from Wicker Park revere this burrito shop (not to be confused with two siblings of the same name within the same block) for top-notch steak tacos and burritos. LTH GNR Thread1141 N. AshlandChicago, IL 60622773.278.0384

properties.name: La Quebrada
properties.description: Family of south and southwest side Mexican restaurants excelling at all the standards, including perhaps the best tortillas in town.LTH GNR Thread723 S BroadwayAurora, IL 60505(630) 896-2535

properties.name: La Quebrada
properties.description: Family of south and southwest side Mexican restaurants excelling at all the standards, including perhaps the best tortillas in town.LTH GNR Thread 4859 W Roosevelt RdCicero, IL 60804more info »

properties.name: La Quebrada Restaurant
properties.description: Family of south and southwest side Mexican restaurants excelling at all the standards, including perhaps the best tortillas in town.LTH GNR Thread5100 S California AveChicago, IL 60632(773) 737-4575

properties.name: La Unica Food Mart
properties.description: Make your way through this Rogers Park grocery and you'll find a lunch counter in back where Cuban-Americans of all ages enjoy authentic cafe de cubano, Cuban sandwiches and more.LTH GNR Thread1515 W Devon AveChicago, IL 60660(773) 274-7788

properties.name: Lao Sze Chuan
properties.description: Chinatown Mall restaurant serving seemingly endless menu of Western Chinese specialties.LTH GNR Thread2172 S Archer AveChicago, IL 60616(312) 326-5040

properties.name: Laschet's Inn
properties.description: Authentic German food, beer and gemutlichkeit in the old German St. Ben's neighborhood.LTH GNR Thread2119 W Irving Park RdChicago, IL 60618(773) 478-7915

properties.name: Manny's Coffee Shop & Deli
properties.description: Cafeteria serving old school Jewish deli classics to a democratic crowd ranging from machers to meshugas.LTH GNR Thread1141 S Jefferson StChicago, IL 60607(312) 939-2855

properties.name: Maria's Bakery (Il Mulino)
properties.description: Authentic Italian sweets and snacks, plus a lively street cafe atmosphere, in Highwood. LTH GNR Thread530 Sheridan RdHighwood, IL 60040(847) 266-0811

properties.name: Marie's Liquor & Pizza
properties.description: Ageless bar and restaurant serving great thin crust pizza on the northwest side. Eat it hot and fresh!  LTH GNR Thread 4129 W Lawrence Ave Chicago, IL 60630

properties.name: Mario's Italian Lemonade
properties.description: Legendary Taylor Street Italian ice stand (opposite GNR honoree Al's) provides one of summertime Chicago's most vibrant street scenes. LTH GNR Thread1068 W Taylor StChicago, IL 60607(312) 738-3570

properties.name: Maxwell Street Market
properties.description: A great selection of Mexican street food and all the tube socks you want, every Sunday just south of the Loop. LTH GNR Thread 640 W Roosevelt Rd Chicago, IL 60607more info »

properties.name: Mekato's Columbian Bakery
properties.description: Crisp, cheesy, light bunuelos are the main draw for this north side spot, but the consistent high quality makes it worthwhile to try everything. LTH GNR Thread 5423 N Lincoln Ave Chicago, IL 60625more info »

properties.name: Mixteco Grill
properties.description: Inventive, upscale Mexican food in north Lakeview.  LTH GNR Thread 1601 W Montrose Ave Chicago, IL 60613more info »

properties.name: Moon's Sandwich Shop
properties.description: A dingy exterior on a changing block on the near west side does not hint of the timeless mastery of the grill work being done inside. Hearty, delicious breakfasts and lunches are the specialty. LTH GNR Thread 16 S Western AveChicago, IL 60612more info »

properties.name: Moto Restaurant
properties.description: Scientific food at the far end of the cutting edge, by a chef who entered our virtual neighborhood to debate his cuisine with us.LTH GNR Thread945 W Fulton MarketChicago, IL 60607(312) 491-0058

properties.name: Myron & Phil's Steak Seafood
properties.description: In a world of change, there remain certain constants. This Lincolnwood steakhouse has been providing that constancy for over 30 years. Fine dining, continental style that your Bubbie would enjoy, and probably has enjoyed if she is from around here. Have a cocktail, relax, enjoy the chicken liver and a steak! LTH GNR Thread 3900 W Devon AveLincolnwood, IL 60712more info »

properties.name: New York Bagel & Bialy Corporation
properties.description: Go to Lincolnwood, pick up some bagels and cream cheese, 24/7. Enjoy! LTH GNR Thread 4714 W Touhy AveLincolnwood, IL 60712more info »

properties.name: Nuevo Leon Restaurant
properties.description: Simple, delicious norteno Mexican food at a family-friendly, consistently popular Pilsen institution.LTH GNR Thread1515 W 18th StChicago, IL 60608(312) 421-1517

properties.name: Old Fashioned Donuts Inc
properties.description: The anchor of its little-visited Roseland neighborhood on the southeast side, this place cranks out fresh doughnuts and breathtakingly rich apple fritters. LTH GNR Thread11248 S Michigan AveChicago, IL 60628(773) 995-7420

properties.name: Papa's Cache Sabroso
properties.description: Humboldt Park storefront is a taste of Puerto Rico, from the paintings on the walls to the perfect roast chicken with garlic, and the yuca and all the other fixings. LTH GNR Thread 2517 W Division StChicago, IL 60622more info »

properties.name: Paradise Pup
properties.description: Fans line up at this tiny spot opposite a forest preserve in Des Plaines for fresh-ground burgers full of smoky grilled flavor. LTH GNR Thread1724 S River RdDes Plaines, IL 60018(847) 699-8590

properties.name: Paramount Room
properties.description: More than just pub food, this River West spot offers a wide range of uniformly excellent comfort foodand good beer and drinks, in a lively setting. LTH GNR Thread 415 North Milwaukee Ave Chicago, IL 60610more info »

properties.name: Pasticceria Natalina
properties.description: Andersonville bakery turning out magically light and delicate versions of Sicilian and Italian specialties such as sfogliatelle. LTH GNR Thread5406 N Clark StChicago, IL 60640(773) 989-0662

properties.name: Patty's Diner
properties.description: Ramshackle but lovable Skokie diner run by a female grill cook and her waitress sisters, focused on hearty breakfasts and sandwiches. LTH GNR Thread3358 Main StSkokie, IL 60076 (847) 675-4274

properties.name: Podhalanka
properties.description: A hearty Polish working-man's spot, easily overlooked on fast-gentrifying Division Street.LTH GNR Thread1549 W Division StChicago, IL 60622(773) 486-6655

properties.name: Poochie's Hot Dogs
properties.description: Come for the hot dogs and hamburgers, but stay for the fried salami sandwich. A Skokie classic still going strong, proving every day that fast food can be great food. LTH GNR Thread 3832 Dempster StSkokie, IL 60076more info »

properties.name: Prairie Grass Cafe
properties.description: Head up to Northbrook for a "casual meal in the kitchen of one of America's best chefs." Great ingredients prepared to highlight their flavor and quality. Simply delicious. LTH GNR Thread 601 Skokie BlvdNorthbrook, IL 60062more info »

properties.name: Renga Tei
properties.description: Japanese comfort food and friendly service draws a homey, corner-coffeeshop style crowd in Lincolnwood.LTH GNR Thread3956 W Touhy AveLincolnwood, IL 60712(847) 675-5177

properties.name: Restaurant Sol De Mexico
properties.description: Mexican sitdown restaurant in the west side Craigin neighborhood, renowned for its complex moles, from yet another branch of the Bahena family. LTH GNR Thread3018 N Cicero AveChicago, IL 60641(773) 282-4119

properties.name: Riviera Italian Imported Foods
properties.description: West side Italian deli offering outstanding housemade sausages and sandwiches, including the "Will Special" (named for LTHForum member YourPalWill).LTH GNR Thread3220 N Harlem AveChicago, IL 60634(773) 637-4252

properties.name: Sabatino's Restaurant & Lounge
properties.description: Sinatra-era Italian-American fine dining restaurant serving Chicago classics like Chicken Vesuvio.LTH GNR Thread4441 W Irving Park RdChicago, IL 60641(773) 283-8331

properties.name: Sahara Kabob
properties.description: Far north side spot specializing in Assyrian and Middle Eastern food. Prices are rock bottom, as you would expect in a place that started as a hot dog stand, but the food is great by any measure.  LTH GNR Thread 6649 N Clark St Chicago, IL 60626more info »

properties.name: Salam Restaurant
properties.description: Unassuming spot on the Albany Park middle-eastern strip offers some of the best falafel, kefta kebab and shawerma in town.LTH GNR Thread4636 N Kedzie AveChicago, IL 60625(773) 583-0776

properties.name: San Soo Gap San
properties.description: Almost-24-hour Korean barbecue spot has stern owners who probably don't quite know what to make of the late-night hipsters scarfing down delicious Korean grilled meats and soups.LTH GNR Thread5247 N Western AveChicago, IL 60625(773) 334-1589

properties.name: Schwa Restaurant
properties.description: Downscale fine dining blending skillfully into its neighborhood, genuine and personal. LTH GNR Thread 1466 N Ashland Ave Chicago, IL 60622more info »

properties.name: Scooter's Frozen Custard LLC
properties.description: Nothing says summer in Roscoe Village like the seasonal opening of this happy stand serving up creamy custard in the tradition of legendary spots like Kopp's in Milwaukee or Ted Drewes in St. Louis.LTH GNR Thread1658 W Belmont AveChicago, IL 60657(773) 244-6415

properties.name: Semiramis
properties.description: Roast chicken, shawerma and other middle eastern dishes at a place more upscale than most on the Kedzie middle eastern strip.LTH GNR Thread4639 N Kedzie AveChicago, IL 60625(773) 279-8900

properties.name: Shan's Grocery & Restaurant
properties.description: Edgewater quickie-mart unexpectedly serves up hot, fresh and delicious Indo-Pakistani food along with the Marlboros and Lotto tickets.LTH GNR Thread5060 N Sheridan RdChicago, IL 60640(773) 769-4961

properties.name: Smak Tak Restaurant
properties.description: This Polish gem in Jefferson Park is able to stand out in a city full of Polish food by paying attention to what is truly important - crispy potato pancakes, fluffy pierogi and pork cutlets prepared the way your doting grandmother should have done in a perfect world. LTH GNR Thread 5961 N Elston AveChicago, IL 60646more info »

properties.name: Smoque BBQ
properties.description: An instant hit in its underserved Old Irving Park neighborhood, offering smoky brisket, ribs, pulled pork and good sides in an easygoing atmosphere. LTH GNR Thread3800 N Pulaski RdChicago, IL 60641(773) 545-7427

properties.name: Spacca Napoli
properties.description: Owner Jonathan Goldsmith studied pizza-making in Italy and imported a massive wood-burning oven (and a pizza chef) to make the best and most authentic Neapolitan-style pizzas Chicago has ever seen.LTH GNR Thread1769 W Sunnyside AveChicago, IL 60640(773) 878-2420

properties.name: Spoon Thai Restaurant
properties.description: Lincoln Square Thai restaurant famous for "secret menu" of brightly authentic Thai dishes.LTH GNR Thread4608 N Western AveChicago, IL 60625(773) 769-1173

properties.name: Spring World Restaurant Inc
properties.description: Yunnanese and Szechwan delights at great prices in the Chinatown Mall. Lots to explore.  LTH GNR Thread 2109 S China PlChicago, IL 60616more info »

properties.name: Steve's Shish Kabob
properties.description: An ideal Middle Eastern restaurant, bursting with hospitality, now improbably in Palos Heights. LTH GNR Thread 10719 S Roberts RdPalos Hills, IL 60465more info »

properties.name: Sticky Rice
properties.description: Chicago's first Thai restaurant devoted to Northern (Isaan) Thai cooking offers a wide range of pungent dishes (only a few of which involve bugs).LTH GNR Thread4018 N Western AveChicago, IL 60618(773) 588-0120

properties.name: Stop Fifty Wood Fired Pizzeria
properties.description: Authentic Neapolitan-style pizza, topped with homegrown herbs, in the Chicago vacation-home community of Michiana Shores, Indiana. LTH GNR Thread500 El Portal DrMichiana Shores, IN 46360(219) 879-8777

properties.name: Sun Wah Bar-B-Que
properties.description: Roasted duck, chicken and pork are the stars on display in the window at this Argyle Street Chinese hole in the wall. LTH GNR Thread1134 W Argyle StChicago, IL 60640(773) 769-1254

properties.name: Sunshine Restaurant
properties.description: Homey Japanese-American diner welcomes a highly diverse Andersonville crowd for non-sushi Japanese comfort food.LTH GNR Thread5449 N Clark StChicago, IL 60640(773) 334-6214

properties.name: Sweets & Savories
properties.description: Unpretentious but impressive Lincoln Park bistro offering innovative cuisine at very reasonable prices.LTH GNR Thread1534 W Fullerton AveChicago, IL 60614(773) 281-6778

properties.name: Tac Quick
properties.description: Chic Uptown Thai spot serving eye-opening authentic grilled meats and Thai curries.LTH GNR Thread3930 N Sheridan RdChicago, IL 60613(773) 327-5253

properties.name: Tank Noodle (Pho Xe Tang)
properties.description: Bright and welcoming Argyle Street spot serving excellent versions of Vietnamese soups such as pho and entrees.LTH GNR Thread4953 N Broadway StChicago, IL 60640(773) 878-2253

properties.name: The Elephant
properties.description: The far northwest side's first Thai restaurant offers bright, freshly-flavored versions of Thai classics.LTH GNR Thread5348 W Devon AveChicago, IL 60646(773) 467-1168

properties.name: The Violet Hour
properties.description: More than a bar, this near north side spot features delicious and creative concoctions sure to make an hour or three pass enjoyably. LTH GNR Thread 1247 N Damen Ave Chicago, IL 60622more info »

properties.name: Top-Notch Beefburgers Inc
properties.description: If you fondly remember the classic hamburger of the 50's, served with fries and a milk shake, these south side spots in Beverly and Oak Lawn are for you. Nothing nouveau or overblown here, no way. LTH GNR Thread 2116 W 95th StChicago, IL 60643more info »

properties.name: Tre Kronor
properties.description: Great breakfasts and other homey foods at a sunny, friendly west Andersonville Swedish restaurant.LTH GNR Thread3258 W Foster AveChicago, IL 60625(773) 267-9888

properties.name: Uncle John's Bar BQ
properties.description: The former pitman at GNR honoree Barbara Ann's serves up delectable rib tips and hot links with a hint of sage at this South Side BBQ hut. LTH GNR Thread337 E 69th StChicago, IL 60637(773) 892-1233

properties.name: Uru Swati Restaurant
properties.description: Vegetarian spot on Devon offers flavor and variety sufficient to convince the most dedicated carnivore that meat really is optional.  LTH GNR Thread 2629 W Devon AveChicago, IL 60659more info »

properties.name: Vie Restaurant LLC
properties.description: A Blackbird-alum chef with a strong commitment to regional and seasonal flavors brings a downtown foodie outlook to suburban Western Springs. LTH GNR Thread4471 Lawn AveWestern Springs, IL 60558(708) 246-2082

properties.name: Vito & Nick's Pizzeria
properties.description: A south side institution and paragon of the Chicago "cracker crust" pizza style.  LTH GNR Thread 8433 S Pulaski Rd Chicago, IL 60652more info »

properties.name: Volo Restaurant Wine Bar
properties.description: Wine bar and restaurant serving up innovative small plates to families and trendies in Roscoe Village.LTH GNR Thread2008 W Roscoe StChicago, IL 60618(773) 348-4600

properties.name: White Palace Grill
properties.description: Roosevelt Avenue 24-hour hashslinging joint catering to a colorful mix of late night and early crowds.LTH GNR Thread1159 S Canal StChicago, IL 60607(312) 939-7167

properties.name: Wiener & Still Champion
properties.description: First-class dogs, grilled burgers and freshcut fries, and hand-dipped corndogs are the highlights of this Evanston stand. LTH GNR Thread802 Dempster StEvanston, IL 60202(847) 869-0100

properties.name: Xni-Pec
properties.description: The area's first Yucatecan restaurant offers homemade seafood and meat dishes and warm service in Cicero. LTH GNR Thread5135 W 25th StCicero, IL 60804(708) 652-8680
